answers.answer: Hi, if the stress testing was good, you don't have to worry about the cardiac status. Sometimes diabetes mellitus and hypothyroidism could cause the symptoms described by you. A simple blood test could help detect diabetes and hypothyroidism. Consult your primary care physician for these tests. Regards.

question: I reach the heart rate of 165 within 3 minutes, with very heavy breathing,face beat red and very tired, my blood pressure was way over 200 which she looked at the other girl.  They said my flow was good, an EEG?  I have had  problems with inclines and hills since I have been a kid and running was always a problem.  Walking flat ground I no problems except tired and headaches.I have serve sleep apnea, and yes i'm maybe 40lbs over weigh with diabeties at the age of 55, and Fibro. and vitiam D diffince, and arthritis in every joint in my body.   I have been many times to the gym working out and I have never felt the energy everyone says they do when they are finished excerising.When I was doing aerobaties I was band from the gym until I saw my doctor due to my blood pressure was so bad due to my face was beat red, I almost fainted, and serve pounding in my head and shaking.
title: stress test
